degree: Bachelor of Science in Information and Communications Technology
description: Specialized in Management Information Systems with a solid foundation in data analytics, cloud computing, software development, and machine learning. Gained practical, hands-on experience through diverse projects in artificial intelligence, web development, and business intelligence.

degree: Short Course in Introduction to Networking (CCNA1)
description: Completed foundational training in networking based on the Cisco CCNA1 curriculum. Covered key topics including network architecture, IP addressing, routing protocols, infrastructure services, and basic network security.
Gained hands-on experience in web development technologies, mobile app development, and UI/UX design principles.
